channel.title: Mono on csMacnz's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Mono on csMacnz's Blog

item.title: monocov + Travis-CI = WINNING
item.description: After much frustration, I now have monocov running on my Travis-CI build, and I’m going to share with you how I did it. TL;DR The coverage results don’t seem accurate just yet, but jump to the end to see the full script to get it going on your build. As I mentioned in a previous post , I am building a coveralls.io publisher for .Net code coverage. This means (to me any way) that I need to support mono coverage as well.
